page.title: 12Transport continued
page.content: The railway runs to north of Crawley road, connecting Horsham to Crawley and London, Victoria. FAygate Halt has a few stopping trains, an hourly train both ways and a slight increase in frequency in rush hours. No trains Sunday London Country run an hourly bus service from HOrsham via Roffey to Crawley, serving Faygate. Some bus services terminate East Grinstead, and are unreliable on their return journeys. Colgate has a bus once every 2 hours from Horsahm toCrawley. Colgate is lucky to have a bus service as some senior citizens are not able to afford the expense of a car, or are now unfit to drive.
